snippet.title: Fallout Equestria: REMAINS - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Fallout Equestria: Remains (FOE: Remains)

General info:
The genre of this game can be described as a platformer, 2D-shooter, or roguelike with RPG elements. The player will travel around the post-apocalyptic world, explore its various corners, communicate with locals and help them, level up, and fight enemies using a vast arsenal of weapons and magic. The full playthrough of this game will take 30 hours or more.

Official links:
Site - http://foe.ucoz.org/main_en.html
Browser version - http://foe.ucoz.org/remains.html
PC version - can be downloaded from the official site (http://foe.ucoz.org/main_en.html)
Wiki - https://fallout-equestria-remains.fandom.com/wiki/Fallout_Equestria:_Remains_Wiki
Discord - https://discordapp.com/invite/qWYAbsp

Big thanks to all developers of such an amazing game!
Empalu - The general idea, coding, game design, graphic design, location design, story, and a bit of everything. (https://www.deviantart.com/empalu)
DipFanken - Graphic design, location design. (https://www.deviantart.com/dipfanken)
Voidstar - Story.
Mihasik - English localization. (https://www.deviantart.com/mihasik)
Apple_Snack, GreyGazer, Shadow_Of_History, SiMonk0 - Various help with development.
GriffinPie, Aleck233, EmeraldGalaxy, EBK21 - Chinese localization.
Ziemniakford aka Goblin, Kraples, Esperant - Poland localization

Also
Big thanks to MEQA (https://soundcloud.com/meqamusic) and Pony Killerz (https://soundcloud.com/ponykillerz) for letting me use their awesome composition - https://soundcloud.com/meqamusic/stygian
